channel.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
channel.description:
If you haven't seen it, here is the link:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q1UPMEmCqZo']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q1UPMEmCqZo[/url]
It's a live action film of Half Life 2 and it's universe of goodys! It has to be the BEST recreation of ANY video Game on youtube.
Post here your thoughts on the marvelous sequel.

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: BerZerK
item.description:
Escape from City 17 was very well done and is the best fan-made video of a game I’ve seen. I’m looking forward to see the second part.

Read full topic
item.source: Did you like Escape from City 17?

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: Yomomasface
item.description:
Yeah, Episode 2 better not be a let down! Especially with this long wait. :meh: They say they will have a preview for EP2 some time but yeah, all we can do now is wait!

Read full topic

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: TheOneAndOnly
item.description:
I liked Escape from City 17, but it was only because it featured the secondary fire of the SMG. I love that grenade so much… So very useful.

Mmmmmyes.

item.source: Did you like Escape from City 17?

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Yeah, even with that so-called “acting”

For the 40$ budget, you really can’t complain about it being poorly made…

As for the acting, it’s a fucking indie movie. A fanfilm at that. I’m not going to ask you to do better, but I WILL ask that you recognise that not all things put in front of a camera are going to be summer blockbuster caliber.

Read full topic
item.source: Did you like Escape from City 17?

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: Mangled
item.description:
No I didn’t. I thought it was lame, poorly made and very overrated.

Most of its hype came from it being featured in steam news.

Read full topic

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: Yomomasface
item.description:
SassyRobot:

I made no mistake, you just proved you’re an idiot.
You can’t tell the difference between purchase and purchose?

Better idea, click on “More From” on youtube instead of related videos in future.

Ok, i never said i couldn’t tell the difference form Purchase and Purchose! Jesus frekkin Christ! And I thought the people on these Forums would be a wee bit nicer. :meh:

Read full topic

MadMax:

it rules ´nuff said.

btw they are using softair/airsoft guns

Yeah. The MP7 looks exactly like my WELL MP7. The USP Match however, looks a little like the real one in which i also own. And for the love of god, never refer to it as “Softair.” I just had to say that.

Imonfire:

No no no he’s right. You’re stupid.

XSPLANE. :rabies:

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: Exoskeletor
item.description:
Yomomasface:

Totally. By far the BEST editing I’ve EVER seen on youtube! :freeman:

do you remember a video a guy have made some years ago in which an aeroplane was landing on his car? check the video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7_ITIlPvcm0 if i remember correctly a company have instantly hire the man this is another good example

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: Samapico
item.description:
Yomomasface:
SassyRobot:

I can’t imagine anyone is stupid enough to click on the link of the “sequel” which isn’t by the same people. It’s either a dickhead hungry for views, or a rickroll.

Well there’s your first mistake. There’s two people with the name “Escape From City 17.” The PurchaseBrothers, and the PurchoseBrothers. The PurchaseBrothers are making the real sequel. The PurchoseBrothers are the idiot’s with the shitty Rick Roll crap. When i clicked on the fake part 2, i was so fucking pissed. But hey, the real part two is coming out soon!

… Did you just admit being stupid?

Read full topic
item.source: Did you like Escape from City 17?

Totally. By far the BEST editing I’ve EVER seen on youtube! :freeman:

item.title: Did you like Escape from City 17?
item.dc:creator: Yomomasface
item.description:
Exoskeletor:

it was totally blow me away. and they make it will only 500 dollar budget? but how? what did they use? i didnt like only the dialog. i want to see zombies now

Yeah, only a $500 budget! Kinda surprised me too! They used Tokyo Mauri MP7’s, and i think a real USP Match YET that’s way over $500! I’d like to know how they did everything. Maybe there will be a “Behind the Scenes” or something! Now that would kick so much ass! I can’t wait to see the Zombies either bro! :3

Read full topic
item.source: Did you like Escape from City 17?

I can’t imagine anyone is stupid enough to click on the link of the “sequel” which isn’t by the same people. It’s either a dickhead hungry for views, or a rickroll.

Well there’s your first mistake. There’s two people with the name “Escape From City 17.” The PurchaseBrothers, and the PurchoseBrothers. The PurchaseBrothers are making the real sequel.
